events.event_description: He is NOT here; HE IS RISEN! Join our Resurrection Sunday Facebook Livestream and celebrate with us the LORDs victory over the grave. This is going to be a powerful reminder of the price that was paid for us, and the empty grave that changed everything!

services.event_description: You can always look forward to our regular worship service! Join us every Sunday at 10:30am as we come together and worship the Lord!
Our W.O.W. service is a mid-week worship service to help get us all through the week. It's a great time of fellowship and praise and we would love to see you there!
Getting together in small groups and discussing the Word of God is a great way to learn and grow closer as a church community. Ask us about our LifeGroups.
